* AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
The baseline number of instances running  fell from 8 to 6 and the peak number of instances fell from 16 to 10 due to budget restrictions.
Also the pricing strategy changed to a more affordable one. EC2 Instance Savings Plans apply to a specific instance family within a region and provide the largest discounts.
Instances are reserved for 1 year period withou upfront cost.
